title: Taliban threatens southern Afghan city, civilians flee
text:
Taliban threatens southern Afghan city, civilians flee 
Published By: Reuters - Today 
LASHKAR GAH, Afghanistan (Reuters) - Taliban forces advanced on the capital of the volatile southern Afghan province of Helmand on Tuesday a...
